fields.name: Stop-In Effect:
fields.value: Enter the Warehouse, a separate board. Movement is only 1d6 in the Warehouse.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Purple - Gain a **Industrial Goods.** (Chest 31)
Pink - Gain 1500$ and and **Industrial Goods**. (Chest 31)
Orange - Lose 300$.
Dark Gray - Nothing.
